## R Markdown

```{r load-packages, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(knitr) # for tables
library(readxl)
```


## Load the data


```{r load-data, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
# The data is missing from the git hub repository
Keiser <- read_excel("./Plotting-av-styrke1.xlsx")

```

## Select variables to use


```{r}
Keiser %>%
  select("FP", "Tid", "Bein", "Maks effekt W") %>%
print()
```
## Calculate difference between t1 and t2

```{r}

# Add commnets to describewhat the code does!

Keiser %>%
  select("FP", "Tid", "Bein", "Maks effekt W") %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = "Tid", values_from = "Maks effekt W") %>%
  mutate(diff = t2 - t1) %>%
 print()


```
## Calculate sd of diff

```{r summarise-data, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, results = "asis"}

Keiser %>%
  select("FP", "Tid", "Bein", "Maks effekt W") %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = "Tid", values_from = "Maks effekt W") %>%
  mutate(diff = t2 - t1) %>%
  summarise(sd.diff = sd(diff)) %>%
  print()
  


```
## Calculate Technical Error (te) as diff / squareroot

```{r}
Keiser %>%
  select("FP", "Tid", "Bein", "Maks effekt W") %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = "Tid", values_from = "Maks effekt W") %>%
  mutate(diff = t2 - t1) %>%
  summarise(sd.diff = sd(diff),
            te = sd.diff / sqrt(2)) %>%
  print()

```
